document_data.name: Low-light Vision
document_data.mainbody: '''''Low-light vision''''' was a [[transmutation]] [[spell]] that granted a target creature the [[low-light vision|type of vision]] after which it was named.
document_data.Effects: By casting this spell, the affected creature could see twice as far as a [[human]] in poorly lit areas such as those illuminated by starlight or candlelight. The recipient of this effect could more effectively distinguish and better discern details within its field of vision.
document_data.Casting: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required a small [[candle]] in its casting.
